entry.title: I know that you've been worried, but you're dripping in my favor
entry.summary:
Author: dickweed7

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,021Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 55

Summary: “I came here to get away from Christmas,” Kon said, his voice a husky, dangerous heat that had Tim trembling. The embarrassment hit Tim like a cold wave. “Oh, God, I’m so sorry. I—I literally forgot what day it was. I mean, we don’t have to. I can untie it. I’m an idiot.” Kon reached out, enveloping Tim’s jaw, his thumb stroking the curve of his cheekbone. His touch was instantly grounding, a tether in the sensory storm Tim had conjured. “Don't apologize for being smart, Tim. Or for knowing exactly what I need,” Kon said, his voice dropping to a seductive purr. He leaned in, his mouth hovering close to Tim’s ear, the heat of his breath a sudden shock. “This can be about us. And we definitely have to.” -- or in which Tim forgets Christmas and Tim offers sex as his gift to Kon. That's it. That's the fic.

entry.title: Violet Birds in Emerald Skies
entry.summary:
Author: Niveara

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,368Chapters: 23/?Kudos: 838

Summary: Hal.exe stopped working. This child, this Sparrow, was THE Sparrow? Like the Champion of Predator, Wielder of Violet Light, Paragon of Love, Sparrow? The Star Sapphire with ‘rings for eyes’ that Kilowog, Green Lantern 1-9-8-6, was always going on and on about? The individual Carol, Star Sapphire 1-9-6-2, was always saying was a 'stain’ against the Zamaron’s Star Sapphires Corps?But they were just an itty bitty little baby.“You’re joking right” he teased assuming this was just Sinestro trying his hand at humor “please tell me your joking. Surely a 6 year old human child isn’t THE Sparrow”“You are correct” Sinestro agreed flatly a small smile forming upon his face as Hal relaxed at his response “a 6 year old human child is not THE Sparrow”“Oh thank-“ Hal started only to get cut off as Sinestro finished his thoughts.“It is my understanding that the child is only 4 and a half”ORTim Drake becomes a Star Sapphire shortly after watching the Flying Graysons fall. Despite the crime, Tim had helped Bruce and him an extraordinary number of times, either by hacking into computer systems by himself, or by using his wit to gather intel. entry.title: And That We Call Being

Author: oldrockformations

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,045Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 314

Summary: “I’m Sorry?” If Tim's… friend (would Tim get shot if he were to call Jason his brother?) is feeling particularly gregarious, they might chat about light subjects—the latest trafficking ring Jason's brought down, the newest security measures government agencies have implemented to try and keep Tim out, whatever shenanigans their assorted siblings and sibling-adjacent friends are getting into. But they've always avoided any conversation topics that might be considered heavier. Namely: feelings. It's been a perfectly normal Tuesday morning so far. They haven't exchanged any words today, other than a dry greeting when Tim sat down half-an-hour ago. There's no way they're about to have this conversation right here, right now.
